sentences.en: A patient with advanced neoplastic disease often presents with anemia.
sentences.cn: 晚期肿瘤病人常有贫血.

sentences.en: Anemia is a common adverse effect of Hepatitis C combination therapy.
sentences.cn: 结论:作者总结道:促红素α使用与减低利巴韦林剂量的策略相比伴有持续病毒学应答的提高.

sentences.en: Anemia was defined as a baseline hematocrit of less than 36 %.
sentences.cn: 贫血是指作为红细胞容积基线低于36%.

sentences.en: Cattle are immune to equine infections anemia.
sentences.cn: 牛不感染马传染性贫血.

sentences.en: I was put on iron tablets for my anemia.
sentences.cn: 我曾因贫血吃补铁药片。

sentences.en: If the body does not produce enough red blood cells , anemia results.
sentences.cn: 如果身体不能制造足够的红血球, 就引起贫血.

sentences.en: In aplastic anemia patients ( 7 cases ) RET # decreased and HFR increased moderately.
sentences.cn: 再生障碍性贫血 ( aa ) 患者的RET # 重度减低,HFR中度增高.

sentences.en: Interference with the normal production of heme or globin leads to anemia.
sentences.cn: 血红素或球蛋白的正常产生收到干扰会导致贫血。

sentences.en: Most cases of aplastic anemia are idiopathic.
sentences.cn: 多数再生障碍性贫血的病例是自发性的.

sentences.en: Perhaps the present concern with the values of liberal arts education portends an intellectual anemia.
sentences.cn: 现在关心大学文科教育的重要性也许意味着患了智力贫血症。

sentences.en: Pernicious anemia in human is due to failure of absorption of vitamin B 12.
sentences.cn: 人的恶性贫血是由于不能吸收维生素B12的结果.

sentences.en: Since density increases with the concentration of red cells, an unusually low density may indicate anemia.
sentences.cn: 血液的密度随着红血球的浓度而增加, 因而过低的血液密度可说明患者贫血.

sentences.en: The doctor analysed the blood sample for anemia.
sentences.cn: 医生化验血样看是否贫血。

sentences.en: The doctors analyzed the blood sample for anemia.
sentences.cn: 医生们分析了贫血的血样.

sentences.en: The treatment for tularemia can cause aplastic anemia.
sentences.cn: 治疗兔热症会引起不可再生性贫血.

sentences.en: Victims of this disease suffer from a severe and usually fatal anemia.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病的患者常患严重的,往往是致命性的贫血症.
